parse_dump module¶

Created on Thu Feb 25 22:05:42 2021

@author: Nishad Mandlik

class parse_dump.Dump(file_paths, min_rssi=- 70)[source]¶

Bases: object

__init__(file_paths, min_rssi=- 70)[source]¶

Generic interface for parsing multiple WireShark capture files.

Parameters

  • file_paths (list) – List of paths of WireShark capture files. Paths should be strings.

  • min_rssi (int, optional) – Minimum RSSI threshold (in dBm) for filtering packets. Packets with RSSI below this value will be discarded. Defaults to -70.

Returns

None.

extract_devices()[source]¶

Extract devices from the captured packets.

Returns

Device parameters extracted from the captured packets.

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

reload()[source]¶

Reload the packets from the initially specified files.

Returns

None.

set_min_rssi(rssi)[source]¶

Set minimum RSSI for filtering. Updating this value should be followed by a call to ‘reload’, to update the filtered packets.

Parameters

rssi (int) – Minimum RSSI threshold (in dBm) for filtering packets. Packets with RSSI below this value will be discarded.

Returns

None.

class parse_dump.DumpDir(dir_path, min_rssi=- 70)[source]¶

Bases: parse_dump.Dump

__init__(dir_path, min_rssi=- 70)[source]¶

Interface for parsing WireShark capture files from the same directory.

Parameters

  • dir_path (str) – Paths of WireShark capture directory.

  • min_rssi – Minimum RSSI threshold (in dBm) for filtering packets. Packets with RSSI below this value will be discarded. Defaults to -70.

_get_file_paths()[source]¶

Get a list of paths of all files present in the initially specified capture directory.

Returns

List of paths of all files from the capture directory.

Return type

list

reload()[source]¶

Reload packets from all files in the intially specified directory.

Returns

None.

class parse_dump.DumpFile(file_path, min_rssi=- 70)[source]¶

Bases: parse_dump.Dump

__init__(file_path, min_rssi=- 70)[source]¶

Interface for parsing a single WireShark capture files.

Parameters

  • file_path (str) – Paths of WireShark capture files.

  • min_rssi – Minimum RSSI threshold (in dBm) for filtering packets. Packets with RSSI below this value will be discarded. Defaults to -70.
